title: Create custom buttons for quick access to commands
author: sureshht
body_snippet:

comments.snippet:
What do you mean with "quick access to commands"? Are you trying to execute some (predefined) commands on the remote end?
I guess this will be somewhat dependant on the issue #181 and related, as it's quite hard to do anything similar with (nested) putty.
